channel.title: Twisting The Wind with Johnny Pemberton
channel.description: Twisting the Wind is an aural experiment in electronic communication featuring live talking interviews with eccentrics and experts as well as phone calls with strangers from all points in the spectrum.
channel.itunes:author: Johnny Pemberton, Starburns Audio
channel.itunes:summary: Twisting the Wind is an aural experiment in electronic communication featuring live talking interviews with eccentrics and experts as well as phone calls with strangers from all points in the spectrum.

image.title: Twisting The Wind with Johnny Pemberton

item.title: The Executive Bone Zone with Brendon and Randy
item.description: The darlings of fart, the deers of queer, the boners of zones: Randy Liedtke and Brendon Walsh make a belated return to the hot seats on Twisting the Wind. It’s fun conversational jaunt featuring the greatest minds in the business getting down hard. check out their amazing podcast: The Bone Zone (available on itunes)

item.title: Sounds with Karen Kilgariff & Drennon Davis
item.description: a very very musical episode! comedy/music/life genius’ Karen Kilgariff and Drennon Davis blast out a multitude of brazen song styles across this windy sound platform. It’s all full enjoyment, lots of it straight from the moment it was in. Happy Christmas.

item.title: Stowed Notions with Mikey and Adam

item.title: Happy Bullshit Somewhere with David Axe
item.description: Combat Journalist, David Axe, talks to Johnny about his experiences, both dangerous and boring, as war correspondent in conflict regions across the globe.
item.itunes:title: Happy Bullshit Somewhere with David Axe
item.itunes:summary: Combat Journalist, David Axe, talks to Johnny about his experiences, both dangerous and boring, as war correspondent in conflict regions across the globe.
item.content:encoded: Combat Journalist, David Axe, talks to Johnny about his experiences, both dangerous and boring, as war correspondent in conflict regions across the globe.

item.title: Lagomorph Hunting with Tyler Rabbit
item.description: Johnny ventures in the great dry inland east on a true rabbit hunt with animator, knife collector, tobacco enthusiast, and “Finders” conspiracy expert Tyler Rabbit. ALSO - outside digital contact is made to get the technical bottom of some ancient apple rejection product problems.
item.itunes:title: Lagomorph Hunting with Tyler Rabbit
item.itunes:summary: Johnny ventures in the great dry inland east on a true rabbit hunt with animator, knife collector, tobacco enthusiast, and “Finders” conspiracy expert Tyler Rabbit. ALSO - outside digital contact is made to get the technical bottom of some ancient apple rejection product problems.
item.content:encoded: Johnny ventures in the great dry inland east on a true rabbit hunt with animator, knife collector, tobacco enthusiast, and “Finders” conspiracy expert Tyler Rabbit. ALSO - outside digital contact is made to get the technical bottom of some ancient apple rejection product problems.

item.title: Infrasound Crappie Portal
item.description: An extra very special solo edition episode! Johnny pontificates about music while occasionally making sonic recommendations from his grandpa enclave. A phone call is made in hopes of creating a portal using frozen carp. Another phone call is made seeking a solution for a warehouse chain’s customer retention problem.
item.itunes:title: Infrasound Crappie Portal
item.itunes:summary: An extra very special solo edition episode! Johnny pontificates about music while occasionally making sonic recommendations from his grandpa enclave. A phone call is made in hopes of creating a portal using frozen carp. Another phone call is made seeking a solution for a warehouse chain’s customer retention problem.

item.title: Opinionated Rascal with Matty Goldberg
item.description: Comedian, sports dude, and brain tumor survivor, Matty Goldberg, joins Johnny in the studio for a medicated learning chat session. Other parts of the episode feature calls made to investigate the parameters of thirst, the end of wind tripping, and the longest goodbye.
item.itunes:title: Opinionated Rascal with Matty Goldberg
item.itunes:summary: Comedian, sports dude, and brain tumor survivor, Matty Goldberg, joins Johnny in the studio for a medicated learning chat session. Other parts of the episode feature calls made to investigate the parameters of thirst, the end of wind tripping, and the longest goodbye.

item.title: Stochastic Dopamine Perturbation with Dr. Paul Johnson
item.description: Full Phone Episode! Johnny dials down to the Scripps Research Institute to talk to neuroscientist Dr. Paul Johnson PhD. three utltra fine listening pieces are teased at the beginning and sweet Oklahoma honey is chatted up about the nature of explosions and privacy in storage.
item.itunes:title: Stochastic Dopamine Perturbation with Dr. Paul Johnson

item.title: Mayhem Uptake Inhibitor
item.description: Johnny hits the snus, gives a pepper, and swivels around in a chair with MMA mastermind Jason Mayhem Miller. ALSO, some song snippets are delivered as well as classic reach-out-and-touch-someone phone moments of a bass laden nature.

item.title: Sloth Speed Explosion
item.description: Johnny sits down with musician, actor, and elder hepcat Lee Weaver for regalement in legendary tales of yesteryear. Flanking the interview are a diverse trio of phone calls in which the following topics are dealt with through forced conversation: sloths, flute solo, Yanni, rest, bullet speed.

Flanking the interview are a diverse trio of phone calls in which the following topics are dealt with through forced conversation: sloths, flute solo, Yanni, rest, bullet speed.

item.title: Doug Lussenhop & more
item.description: Doug Lussenhop, AKA DJ Douggpound, joins Johnny for a highly informal hot city night chat session. Doug is known the world over as a skateboarder, writer/editor for all things “Tim and Eric”, dog owner, music specialist, tireless arborist, strong swimmer, cyclist, joke pioneer, and comrade to Johnny Pemberton. This episode features several songs Doug and Johnny have crafted together, as well as links to more. Phone call reach-outs in this episode feature fine customer service talent from the Rocky Mountains.

item.title: Keystone Species
item.description: Johnny goes deep off the grid into a northern California coastal forest to have a fireside chat with biologist, record hound, and long time friend Patrick Lien. This episode also features 2 songs from Patrick's epically creepy 45 find and some phone calls with nice confused ladies somewhere out there in the corporate multiverse.

item.title: James Kunstler & more
item.description: Johnny Pemberton brings this experimental interview program to new levels and turns the interview inside out. Episode 2 features "Peak Oil", "James Kuntsler" and "Kraft".

item.itunes:summary: Johnny Pemberton brings this experimental interview program to new levels and turns the interview inside out. Episode 2 features "Peak Oil", "James Kuntsler" and "Kraft".

item.title: Danny Holloway
item.description: On the premiere episode of Twisting The Wind, Johnny is joined by legendary DJ Danny Holloway and has guerilla phone interview with a customer care representative. Download, share, enjoy!
item.itunes:title: Danny Holloway
